articles.title: Denver police kill armed man pulled over in stolen car
articles.description: AURORA, Colo. (AP) — An armed man driving a stolen car was shot and killed by Denver police on Monday, authorities said.
articles.content:
AURORA, Colo. (AP) An armed man driving a stolen car was shot and killed by Denver police on Monday, authorities said.
The shooting happened during the evening rush hour after Denver police officers saw a stolen vehicle in the southwest part of the city and … [+573 chars]

articles.author: By MARK KENNEDY AP Entertainment Writer
articles.title: Streaming TV programming for kids embraces iconic brands
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — New technology. Same furry faces.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) New technology. Same furry faces.
When Apple was thinking about what kind of children's TV programming it wanted on its new streaming service, it doubled down on two multi-generational crowd-pleasers Snoopy and Sesame Street.
Apple TV Plus has… [+5197 chars]

articles.title: Woman who wore monkey mask during robbery sent to prison
articles.description: PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) — A woman who wore a monkey mask and brandished a gun when she robbed a Rhode Island gas station last year has been sent to prison for seven years, prosecutors say.
articles.content:
PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) A woman who wore a monkey mask and brandished a gun when she robbed a Rhode Island gas station last year has been sent to prison for seven years, prosecutors say.
Ashley Weaver, 28, of Boston, was sentenced Friday after pleading guilty … [+705 chars]

articles.author: By MARCIA DUNN AP Aerospace Writer
articles.title: Space-baked cookies, 'mighty' mice back on Earth via SpaceX
articles.description: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) — The first batch of space-baked cookies is back on Earth, along with muscle-bound “mighty” mice and other space station experiments.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) The first batch of space-baked cookies is back on Earth, along with muscle-bound mighty mice and other space station experiments.

articles.description: AP source: Carolina Panthers completing coaching deal with Baylor's Matt Rhule.
articles.content: Dean Blandino, a Fox Sports analyst and former NFL vice president of officiating, says 'officiating community feels like it's under attack.'
